job.title: Software Engineer - Health and Wellness
job.description:
We’re looking for geniuses. Dreamers. Inventors. Innovators. People with the will to get stuff done. Doers who’ll rip an idea out of thin air. Make it a reality. Own it.And amaze their peers. Sound like you? Welcome home.
As a Software Engineer for our Health & Wellness team, you will be a member of the Hy-Vee delivery team following an agile delivery cadence. Your primary focus is to help us make data and system integration within the Hy-Vee ecosystem secure, highly scalable, and predictable. You will work in a hybrid cloud environment helping to build our core platform infrastructure that hundreds of client applications will consume. We are looking for people who can not only be great individual contributors, but also pair program and mentor other engineers.
.
Key Responsibilities
Commit code for new features that enhance our products according to a well defined roadmap.
Help us find insights and opportunities to improve our products through monitoring and data.
Pair with other team members to cross-pollinate ideas and skills.
Champion code quality, maintainability, and reliability.
Contribute heavily to user story definition that takes our technology stack into consideration, but also continue to push the bounds of what is possible.
Help maintain a positive, open, and productive team culture.
Qualifications
Expert level knowledge of one of the following programming languages: JavaScript, Java, C#
Production experience with JavaScript UI frameworks such as React or Angular
Production experience implementing RESTful APIs
Demonstrable understanding of the components, execution and security concerns of web applications
Demonstrable grasp of logical data modeling techniques (ex. entity relationship diagrams)
Experience using version control; preferably git
Experience writing tests for new code and the ability to articulate the benefits of tests
A Strong Candidate Will Also Have
Experience building cloud-native applications, especially Google Cloud Platform (GCP)
Experience working with containers (kubernetes, docker, etc.)
Production experience writing CSS/SASS/LESS
Production experience with data storage systems such as PostgreSQL, Mongo, or Elasticsearch
Understanding of event-oriented software architectures
Production experience with OAuth and Identity Provider integration
Degree level qualifications in a technical related subject
Demonstrable knowledge of secure programming techniques
Experience with test driven design and general automation
may be filled at a lower or higher level depending on experience.****
About Hy-Vee, Inc.
Hy-Vee, Inc. is an employee-owned corporation operating more than 260 retail stores across eight Midwestern states with sales of $10 billion annually. The supermarket chain is synonymous with quality, variety, convenience, healthy lifestyles, culinary expertise and superior customer service. Hy-Vee ranks in the Top 10 Most Trusted Brands and has been named one of America’s Top 5 favorite grocery stores. The company’s 80,000 employees provide “A Helpful Smile in Every Aisle” to customers every day.
Visit
to apply today and learn about all the exciting things our IT organization does!
